annotations.description: We can only hope that the managers will be able to motivate the players and spark them into life in the next games. The football on offer today has been disappointing. It was a very tight match, with not much between the two teams. The strategy of the home side was to control the pace of the match with possession style football. Whereas the strategy of the away side was a bit risky and reliant on solid defending to dispossess the opponent and break fast.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: The match has just finished.

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: Marco Sportiello (Atalanta) gets a yellow card.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Alejandro Gomez (Atalanta) takes the corner, but he overhits it and none of his teammates are able to reach the ball.

Alejandro Gomez (Atalanta) bursts into the box and pulls the trigger, but he can't beat the goalkeeper. He directed his daisy cutter towards the right post, but one of the defenders reacted brilliantly to block it. The ball goes out of play. Atalanta are awarded a corner kick.
Suso (AC Milan) fails to deliver a decent cross from a long range free kick. The opposition's defence intercepts the effort.

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: Alejandro Gomez (Atalanta) is the one who receives a yellow card.
A free kick has been awarded to AC Milan. Andrea Conti (Atalanta) robs an opponent of the ball and explodes in anger when Davide Massa blows for a foul.

annotations.label: time
annotations.description: We will have 4 min. of added time.
A long pass, executed by Gabriel Paletta (AC Milan), missed the precision to reach his teammates.
Suso (AC Milan) takes the free kick from a long way out but the defender manages to get it clear.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: The referee allows time for a substitution. Giacomo Bonaventura will be replaced by M'Baye Niang (AC Milan).
Giacomo Bonaventura (AC Milan) gets on the end of a pass and takes a shot from the edge of the box, but it's blocked by one of the defending players.

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: Davide Massa shows a yellow card to Andrea Petagna (Atalanta) for his blatant foul.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Nothing comes of the resulting corner from Giacomo Bonaventura (AC Milan). The defence is alert and manages to cut it out.
Carlos Bacca (AC Milan) tries to slide the ball through to a teammate but it's well blocked by a defender. The ball goes out of play and AC Milan have been awarded a corner kick.
Post! Carlos Bacca (AC Milan) latches on to a sweet pass inside the box and unleashes a shot which only hits the right post. What an unlucky moment for him.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Alejandro Gomez (Atalanta) takes the corner kick but the ball only finds the head of an opponent.

Roberto Gagliardini (Atalanta) rises high to head a nice lofted cross towards the roof of the net. Unfortunately for him, his close range effort lacks pace and Gianluigi Donnarumma makes a comfortable save. The ball is out of play and the linesman points at the corner flag. Corner to Atalanta.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Here is a change. Gianluca Lapadula is going off and Vincenzo Montella gives the last tactical orders to Carlos Bacca (AC Milan).

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Remo Freuler (Atalanta) takes the corner kick and sends a lovely ball into the penalty area, but the opposition's defence is ready and knocks the ball to safety.
Franck Kessie (Atalanta) races towards goal but the defender gets back well to make a challenge. Atalanta earn a corner.
AC Milan take a quick free kick with a short pass and play continues.
Remo Freuler (Atalanta) makes a rough challenge and Davide Massa blows his whistle for a foul. A free kick to AC Milan.
Andrea Conti (Atalanta) escapes without any punishment from the referee after using excessive force to foul his opponent. AC Milan are given an advantage. They have a free kick.

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: Andrea Conti (Atalanta) has tested the patience of referee Davide Massa and goes into the book for a previous late challenge.

Juraj Kucka (AC Milan) and his stunning dribble! He zig zags through the defence and gets in front of the keeper. He faints to shoot and then suddenly strikes goalwards, but his effort misses the target by a whisker. Very unlucky for Juraj Kucka (AC Milan). This could have been a legendary goal.
Davide Massa blows his whistle as Gianluca Lapadula (AC Milan) used excessive force in the tackle during an attack.
Boukary Drame (Atalanta) has picked up a minor injury, but it looks like he will be able to continue.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: A quickly taken corner by AC Milan.

The defence is alert as they clear a dangerous cross from Suso (AC Milan). The referee and his assistant both point at the corner flag. AC Milan will have an opportunity to threaten the opposition's goal.

annotations.label: injury
annotations.description: Boukary Drame (Atalanta) is being forced to leave the pitch in order to receive medical treatment and his team will play with a man short for a few minutes.

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: This yellow card was deserved. The tackle by Mario Pasalic (AC Milan) was quite harsh and Davide Massa didn't hesitate to show him a yellow card.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Giacomo Bonaventura (AC Milan) floats the ball in from the corner but it's intercepted.
Juraj Kucka (AC Milan) sends the ball into the box from the side of the pitch, but his cross is blocked. The referee blows his whistle, AC Milan are awarded a corner kick.
Alejandro Gomez (Atalanta) gets on the end of a pass on the edge of the area, but he drags his shot just wide of the right post.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Vincenzo Montella has decided to make a change. Mattia De Sciglio (AC Milan) replaces Luca Antonelli.
Roberto Gagliardini (Atalanta) gets on the ball and beats an opponent, but his run is stopped by the referee Davide Massa who sees an offensive foul.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: The referee stops play so that a substitution can be made and Leonardo Spinazzola leaves the pitch and Remo Freuler (Atalanta) comes on.
Gianluca Lapadula (AC Milan) is caught offside by the linesman and it looks like it is the right decision despite being a very close call.
Luca Antonelli (AC Milan) crosses into the box from near the side line, but he doesn't connect as he wanted and it's cleared by the well organized defence.
Juraj Kucka (AC Milan) receives a good pass just outside the box, unleashes a strike from a promising position, but the shot is blocked by the defender.
Davide Massa blows his whistle and it's Mario Pasalic (AC Milan) who is penalised for an offensive foul. Good decision by the referee.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Jasmin Kurtic goes off the pitch and Boukary Drame (Atalanta) comes on.

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: That will be a yellow card for one of the players. The one who gets booked is Andrea Bertolacci (AC Milan).
Juraj Kucka (AC Milan) breaks past challenges inside the box, but puts too much pace on his pass to Gianluca Lapadula.
Gianluca Lapadula (AC Milan) is deemed to be in an offside position by the linesman and it looks like it is the right decision despite being a very close call.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Gian Piero Gasperini prepares a substitution. Andrea Masiello is replaced by Ervin Zukanovic (Atalanta).
Juraj Kucka (AC Milan) gets the ball and drives a shot high over the bar from the edge of the area.
Giacomo Bonaventura (AC Milan) jinks his way past two defenders and from the edge of the box has an effort which goes just wide of the right post.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Suso (AC Milan) launches a powerful cross from the corner into the box, but the ball is intercepted by the defender.
Ignazio Abate (AC Milan) delivers a promising cross into the box, but it's cleared. AC Milan have been awarded a corner kick. The referee and one of his assistants both point at the corner flag.

Giacomo Bonaventura (AC Milan) controls the ball and sets off to face the goalkeeper, but deep inside the box the ball bounces up on the uneven surface and makes him miss the strike, sending the ball well over the goal.
Jasmin Kurtic (Atalanta) picks up a pass and hits the ball towards goal, but he can't generate enough power to trouble Gianluigi Donnarumma.
Alejandro Gomez (Atalanta) sends in a cross from a long range free kick. However, his effort lacks accuracy and the ball sails off the pitch.
Davide Massa blows his whistle after Juraj Kucka (AC Milan) kicks an opponent's legs instead of the ball. A free kick is awarded to Atalanta.

Suso (AC Milan) receives a low pass just outside the box and unleashes a fine strike towards the middle of the goal. Marco Sportiello pulls off a reflexive save to block his effort. Nice goalkeeping skill, indeed.
Alejandro Gomez (Atalanta) looks to break free, but his touch lets him down and he loses the ball.

Alejandro Gomez (Atalanta) collects a great pass inside the box and misses a golden opportunity. His low drive is headed for the bottom right corner, but the goalkeeper pulls off a marvellous diving save and denies him.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: The second half has just started.

There has not been much to choose between the sides after an absorbing 45 minutes. Let's hope they can continue in the same vein in the second period. There wasn't any evident superiority by either side during the first half. The home side attempts to hold onto the ball for as long as possible, while the away team's main weapon is fast counter attacks.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: The first half of today's match has just finished.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: The corner from Ignazio Abate (AC Milan) is intercepted by the defence.

This shall not pass! Juraj Kucka (AC Milan) lines up a shot from the edge of the box and goes for goal, but the effort is well blocked by a defender. Ignazio Abate (AC Milan) prepares to take a corner kick.

Roberto Gagliardini (Atalanta) latches onto a precise lofted pass into the penalty area and produces a header at goal, but his attempt to the right side of the goal fails to beat Gianluigi Donnarumma, who makes a sensational save.

annotations.label: injury
annotations.description: Andrea Masiello (Atalanta) is asking for medical treatment, but he will have to leave the pitch in order to receive help from the physio.

annotations.label: time
annotations.description: Fourth official shows 1 min. of added time.
Davide Massa has a clear sight and sees a foul from Ignazio Abate (AC Milan). It's a free kick to Atalanta, but it's in no position for a direct shot on goal.
Leonardo Spinazzola swings the cross over. Andrea Conti (Atalanta) gets his head to it but it goes just over the crossbar.
Alejandro Gomez (Atalanta) takes a short free kick.
Davide Massa blows for a foul after Juraj Kucka (AC Milan) was too aggressive in the battle for the ball. Atalanta earn a free kick.
Alejandro Gomez (Atalanta) tries to take the opposition by surprise with a quick free kick into the box.
Juraj Kucka (AC Milan) gives away a foul for a fierce tackle on an opponent. Atalanta get a free kick.
Franck Kessie (Atalanta) delivers a long ball, but it lacks enough power to reach his teammates and is intercepted by one of the defenders.

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: Andrea Masiello (Atalanta) has tested the patience of referee Davide Massa and goes into the book for a previous late challenge.
Some great controlled play and passing in the middle of the pitch from AC Milan.
Suso (AC Milan) attempts to send a pass but the effort is blocked.
Roberto Gagliardini (Atalanta) commits a foul and Davide Massa immediately signals a free kick.
Andrea Petagna (Atalanta) decides to keep the ball to himself and weaves through the defence into the box. From there he takes a shot which goes narrowly wide of the target.
Alejandro Gomez (Atalanta) tries to send a low pass into the box, but it's blocked and cleared.

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: Giacomo Bonaventura (AC Milan) is booked after bringing down an opponent. Davide Massa had an easy decision to make.
AC Milan quickly take the free kick with a short pass.
Davide Massa blows his whistle after Andrea Conti (Atalanta) brings one of his opponents down with a strong tackle. AC Milan have a free kick.

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: Davide Massa shows a yellow card to Leonardo Spinazzola (Atalanta) for his blatant foul.
A cross from the free kick is whipped in by Andrea Bertolacci (AC Milan), but one of the defenders steps in and averts the threat.
Rafael Toloi (Atalanta) makes an overly aggressive challenge and Davide Massa blows his whistle for a foul. AC Milan are awarded a free kick.
Andrea Petagna (Atalanta) launches into a thunderous tackle on his opponent and the referee blows his whistle for a foul.
Alejandro Gomez (Atalanta) attempted to pick out a free teammate inside the box, but Gianluigi Donnarumma comes off the line to clear the ball away.
Giacomo Bonaventura (AC Milan) looks to break free, but an opposing player clears the ball away.
Ignazio Abate (AC Milan) attempts to set up his teammate with a scoring opportunity by chipping in a fine pass from the edge of the box, but one of the defenders intercepts his effort.
The Atalanta players are exchanging fine passes and are waiting for an opportunity to start an attack, but here's a mistake and a loss of possession.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: AC Milan have a chance to score from a corner kick, but the ball is cleared by a defender.
A cross from Luca Antonelli (AC Milan) fails to reach the box as the defence clears the ball away to safety. AC Milan will have a chance to score from a corner kick.
Alejandro Gomez (Atalanta) goes on a solo run, but he fails to create a chance as an opposition player blocks him.
The resulting set piece, sent into the penalty area by Suso (AC Milan), was easily dealt with by one of the defenders.
Andrea Conti (Atalanta) trips an opponent with a slide tackle. Davide Massa stops the game and he could give him a card, but eventually decides on just a warning. AC Milan will take a free kick.
The free kick into the penalty area from Suso (AC Milan) is cleared.
Davide Massa couldn't ignore the rough tackle by Andrea Masiello (Atalanta) and blew his whistle. It's a free kick to AC Milan, but they probably won't attempt a direct shot on goal from here.
Andrea Conti (Atalanta) commits a foul and Davide Massa immediately signals a free kick.
Juraj Kucka (AC Milan) collects the ball from the free kick and immediately sends his close range effort narrowly wide of the right post!
Andrea Conti (Atalanta) gives away a foul for a clumsy challenge. Referee Davide Massa saw the whole situation. There is a free kick near the sideline to AC Milan.
The ball is cleared after Gianluca Lapadula (AC Milan) attempted to dribble past an opposing player.
That was close by Andrea Petagna (Atalanta)! He receives a pass on the edge of the box and shoots, but the ball goes by a whisker over the crossbar.
Gabriel Paletta (AC Milan) attempts a long crossfield pass, but the defence does well to intercept the ball.
Suso (AC Milan) wastes a good opportunity as his pass into the box is blocked by the defence.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: The match has just started.
AC Milan will kick the game off.

annotations.label: lineup1
annotations.description: In the details of this match, you can glance at the lineups while the game is about to begin.
Let us introduce today's referee to you, and it's Davide Massa.
Hello and welcome to our minute by minute commentary of the upcoming clash. We will try to provide you with as accurate as possible picture of the happenings on the pitch. Have fun.
Atalanta have already 10 home victories this season.
Suso has the most assists (9) for AC Milan this season.

We can only hope that the managers will be able to motivate the players and spark them into life in the next games. The football on offer today has been disappointing. It was a very tight match, with not much between the two teams. The strategy of the home side was to control the pace of the match with possession style football. Whereas the strategy of the away side was a bit risky and reliant on solid defending to dispossess the opponent and break fast.
